 Hydras takes the kick to the stomach and caused him to stumble back a few 
feet. . He sent a roar and fired his shoulder cannons at Rodimus.
Carnatron while Rodimus was distracted transformed into Prime and fired the 
big gun twice at his back.
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus tries to jump off of Carnation. The spikes cause some damage to his arms 
> and legs.
> Hydras blade strikes his spoiler, slowing the swing long enough for Rodimus to 
> send a thrust kick his way.
>  Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:As Aerotaur dropped straight in his line 
> of fire, Owlhawk expression
> soured faster than it had ever taken for Starscream to scheme
> something up.
> 
> As his ally dropped to the ground, he decided to take things personal.
> He pushed himself forward and hurled himself at the spy with the speed
> and force of a meteor, ready to throw a punch.
> 
> Owlhawk: Windlord! Try to stabilize him enough for me to attend him!
> That was no ordinary weapon!
>
